btkResampleLabelsByInjection.cxx

00035 
00036 #if defined(_MSC_VER)
00037 #pragma warning ( disable : 4786 )
00038 #endif
00039 
00040 #include "itkEuler3DTransform.h"
00041 
00042 #include "itkImage.h"
00043 #include "itkImageFileReader.h"
00044 #include "itkImageFileWriter.h"
00045 
00046 #include "itkImageMaskSpatialObject.h"
00047 
00048 #include "itkTransformFileReader.h"
00049 
00050 #include "btkResampleLabelsByInjectionFilter.h"
00051 
00052 #include <tclap/CmdLine.h>
00053 
00054 int main( int argc, char *argv[] )
00055 {
00056 
00057   try {
00058 
00059   std::vector< std::string > input;
00060   std::vector< std::string > flabel;
00061   std::vector< std::string > mask;
00062   std::vector< std::string > transform;
00063   std::vector< int >         labels;
00064 
00065   const char *outImage = NULL;
00066   const char *refImage = NULL;
00067 
00068   std::vector< int > x1, y1, z1, x2, y2, z2;
00069 
00070   // Parse arguments
00071 
00072   TCLAP::CmdLine cmd("Resample a set of images using the injection method", ' ', "Unversioned");
00073 
00074   TCLAP::MultiArg<std::string> inputArg("i","input","image file",true,"string",cmd);
00075   TCLAP::MultiArg<std::string> fLabelArg("f","fl","fuzzy label file",true,"string",cmd);
00076   TCLAP::MultiArg<int> labelArg("l","label","label number",true,"int",cmd);
00077   TCLAP::MultiArg<std::string> maskArg("m","mask","mask file",false,"string",cmd);
00078   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> refArg  ("r","reference","Reference image",true,"none","string",cmd);
00079   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> outArg  ("o","output","High resolution image",true,"none","string",cmd);
00080 
00081   TCLAP::MultiArg<std::string> transArg("t","transform","transform file",true,"string",cmd);
00082 
00083   // Parse the argv array.
00084   cmd.parse( argc, argv );
00085 
00086   input = inputArg.getValue();
00087   flabel = fLabelArg.getValue();
00088   mask = maskArg.getValue();
00089   refImage = refArg.getValue().c_str();
00090   outImage = outArg.getValue().c_str();
00091   transform = transArg.getValue();
00092   labels = labelArg.getValue();
00093 
00094   // typedefs
00095   const   unsigned int    Dimension = 3;
00096   typedef itk::Euler3DTransform< double > TransformType;
00097   typedef TransformType::Pointer                    TransformPointer;
00098   typedef std::vector<TransformPointer>             TransformPointerArray;
00099 
00100   typedef float  PixelType;
00101 
00102   typedef itk::Image< PixelType, Dimension >  ImageType;
00103   typedef ImageType::Pointer                  ImagePointer;
00104   typedef std::vector<ImagePointer>           ImagePointerArray;
00105 
00106   typedef itk::Image< unsigned char, Dimension >  ImageMaskType;
00107   typedef itk::ImageFileReader< ImageMaskType > MaskReaderType;
00108   typedef itk::ImageMaskSpatialObject< Dimension > MaskType;
00109 
00110   typedef ImageType::RegionType               RegionType;
00111   typedef std::vector< RegionType >           RegionArrayType;
00112 
00113   typedef itk::ImageFileReader< ImageType >   ImageReaderType;
00114   typedef itk::ImageFileWriter< ImageType >   WriterType;
00115 
00116   typedef itk::TransformFileReader     TransformReaderType;
00117   typedef TransformReaderType::TransformListType * TransformListType;
00118 
00119   typedef btk::ResampleLabelsByInjectionFilter< ImageType, ImageType >  ResamplerType;
00120   ResamplerType::Pointer resampler = ResamplerType::New();
00121 
00122   unsigned int numberOfLabels = 6;
00123   unsigned int numberOfImages = input.size();
00124 
00125   // Filter setup
00126 
00127   ImageType::IndexType  roiIndex;
00128   ImageType::SizeType   roiSize;
00129 
00130   for (unsigned int i=0; i<numberOfImages; i++)
00131   {
00132     // add image
00133     ImageReaderType::Pointer imageReader = ImageReaderType::New();
00134     imageReader -> SetFileName( input[i].c_str() );
00135     imageReader -> Update();
00136     resampler -> AddInput( imageReader -> GetOutput(), labels[i] );
00137 
00138     // add region
00139     if ( mask.size() > 0 )
00140     {
00141       MaskReaderType::Pointer maskReader = MaskReaderType::New();
00142       maskReader -> SetFileName( mask[i].c_str() );
00143       maskReader -> Update();
00144 
00145       MaskType::Pointer mask = MaskType::New();
00146       mask -> SetImage( maskReader -> GetOutput() );
00147 
00148       RegionType roi = mask -> GetAxisAlignedBoundingBoxRegion();
00149       roiIndex = roi.GetIndex();
00150       roiSize  = roi.GetSize();
00151 
00152     } else
00153         {
00154           roiSize  = imageReader -> GetOutput() -> GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize();
00155           roiIndex = imageReader -> GetOutput() -> GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetIndex();
00156         }
00157 
00158     RegionType imageRegion;
00159     imageRegion.SetIndex(roiIndex);
00160     imageRegion.SetSize (roiSize);
00161     resampler -> AddRegion( imageRegion );
00162 
00163     // set transformation
00164     TransformReaderType::Pointer transformReader = TransformReaderType::New();
00165     transformReader -> SetFileName( transform[i] );
00166     transformReader -> Update();
00167 
00168     TransformListType transforms = transformReader->GetTransformList();
00169     TransformReaderType::TransformListType::const_iterator titr = transforms->begin();
00170 
00171     for(unsigned int j=0; j<transforms -> size(); j++,titr++)
00172     {
00173       resampler -> SetTransform(i, j, dynamic_cast< TransformType * >( titr->GetPointer() ) ) ;
00174     }
00175 
00176   }
00177 
00178   // Set reference image
00179 
00180   ImageReaderType::Pointer refReader = ImageReaderType::New();
00181   refReader -> SetFileName( refImage );
00182   refReader -> Update();
00183 
00184   resampler -> UseReferenceImageOn();
00185   resampler -> SetReferenceImage( refReader -> GetOutput() );
00186 
00187   resampler -> Update();
00188 
00189   // Write fuzzy labels
00190 
00191   for (unsigned int i=0; i<numberOfLabels; i++)
00192   {
00193     resampler -> WriteFuzzyLabel( i, flabel[i].c_str() );
00194   }
00195 
00196   // Write image
00197 
00198   WriterType::Pointer writer =  WriterType::New();
00199   writer -> SetFileName( outImage );
00200   writer -> SetInput( resampler -> GetOutput() );
00201 
00202   if ( strcmp(outImage,"none") != 0)
00203   {
00204     writer->Update();
00205   }
00206 
00207 
00208   } catch (TCLAP::ArgException &e)  // catch any exceptions
00209   { std::cerr << "error: " << e.error() << " for arg " << e.argId() << std::endl; }
00210 
00211   return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00212 }
